name: Scab the Roach
description:
This game was created for the Summer 2022 Game Dev Knights Game Jam.

The premise of the game is that you are Scab the Cockroach and you see a delicious sandwich but a seagull has gotten to it first you now must fight him to eat the sandwich.

Here are the credits as follows;

Gameplay Designer: Galo

Gameplay Programmer: Dangerous Hard

UI Programmer: Fancyboom9004

3D Artist: GnomeSayin2U

Sound Designer: Purple Soup

This was such a fun event to participate in- Dangerous Hard
